Very good game so far that said if you don't know chinese or korean (or are not learning either of them, if you are this is probably a good game to expand your vocabulary) and use english get the copy from gungho, I bought this thinking it was the jp version I was wrong, still good game and this one has all the dlc available at launch so make your pick.

给童年补票，重制版优化了跑图打怪刷材料的同时保持了优秀剧情和人设，看到小约小艾动起来真的眼泪都下来了，最棒的jrpg！

45小时白金

神作永远是神作，期待第二部。明年是出空轨2还是界轨2呢？

A remake masterpiece.

While maintain almost all the original stories, battle and other gameplay system mechanics got major update to match modern Trails(Kiseki) series, even surpass the latest one, imo.

Overall very well polished game with no bug I can find myself during a whole playthrough.

If you've never heard a Trails game, but you're a fan of JRPG or other turn-based RPG games. This game definitely worth trying, its main selling point is the HUGE story(really, really, really HUGE) while gameplay is still fun and somewhat challenging if you're willing to play on Nightmare difficulty on 1st playthrough.

It does feel pricey for a 3A price but with a 2A (at best) graphic quality, it's probably smart to wait until sales if you're not a blind stan/fanboy like me.

The beginning of a great series
Great gameplay, soundtrack and story
Captured the essence of the original with an innovative gameplay
A bit too easy
This game is good for relaxing, also it gives u a chance to taste a brand-new old JRPG.
Very nostaligic. Random loading screen freeze happening and had to lower all graphic settings (requirement was within PC spec)
初次体验这系列 表情对话很可爱有趣  音乐很不错 体验很棒 期待下一部

无缝大地图 好
小地图显示新对话内容 好
可切换经典bgm 好
界轨战斗系统 好
自带变速齿轮 好
空之轨迹 好好好 好好好
dont have a chance to finish this game when I was a kid, now I have the chance to finish it. Really nice game
One of the best JRPG I've ever played, remastered perfectly!
好玩。及时战斗和回合制之前切换的很流畅，很不错的战斗设计。剧情还是顶

优点：战斗流畅，剧情有情绪张力（而且提供跳过选项），人物刻画细致；
缺点：有时候节奏拖沓（大迷宫），偶尔会觉得对话废话有点多，物品和技能系统用今天的眼光来看有点简陋，价格偏高（日厂通病）；
总结：优秀的重置，也推荐给JRPG爱好者或者RPG的入门级玩家。

二十多年前玩过原版的老玩家的我强烈推荐这款游戏！
保持了原本的剧情，同时在配音，音乐、和内游动画等方面加入了新的元素！
对老玩家可以重温体验；对新玩家，我觉得你们绝对可以试试！

同时跪求提早推出 SC remake！XDDD

My childhood memory is back in stunning HD!
This isn't just a remaster, it's a rebirth of my fondest memories

Best of the best of JRPG.

And it is the role model of how JRPGs should be remade. 
If you like Tales of Arise, you will love this game.

99/100 I will say. 
The only -1 is that I think Nightmare mode is not made for 1st playthrough, I guess it was for NG+.
The final boss is too painful to finish on 1st playthrough. 

I haven't play it 20 years ago, but I read through the story, it is real good back in the time and even nowadays it story is quite good and make sense than lots of modern games. 
The song at the ending is really good. 
I would like to see the remade more of this series.

Absolutely no need to wait for discount and buy the game but the costume for DLC is a bit expensive to be honest.
Only for super fans if you are going to buy the deluxe edition.

Masterpiece remake, say no more. Need SC and 3rd, chop chop. The voice of Estelle is kinda out of character. 
But still, masterpiece  remake.
阳光治愈的艾斯蒂尔和温柔深沉的约修亚，陪我度过了人生中最黑暗低落的时期，是我心中永远的白月光。”两人一同走过的时光，请你永远在心中珍藏。“
Good story, fantastic JRPG
Nice re-make. Please keep complete the whole series.
Fun story. Love the team. Waiting for the 2nd.
It's a perfect remake. A must-play for every    JRPG fan.
非常棒的重置，重温20年前的感动。

Very fun and enjoyable.
Can't wait for 2nd remake.
我有一颗没玩过空轨的脑子，我真幸运
唯一的差评就是为什么还没有出2
Good enough for old JRPGs remake in past ten years
第一次玩FC的感觉又回来了
This is just the best remaster ever
TAKE MY MONEY AND GIVE ME THE 2nd !!!!!!!!
My game of the year pick!

Just like that summer of '06.
nice remake game
